B

BamAdapterFinder - Class in uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard
Class to read matching forward/reverse BAM records and identify short inserts by looking for overlap between forward read and reverse-complemented reverse read.
BamAdapterFinder() - Constructor for class uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.BamAdapterFinder
 
BamIndexDecoder - Class in uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard
This class is used decode the multiplexed bam file.
BamIndexDecoder() - Constructor for class uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.BamIndexDecoder
 
BamMerger - Class in uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard
A command-line tool to merge BAM/SAM alignment info in a bam with the data in an unmapped BAM file, producing a third BAM file that has alignment data and all the additional data from the unmapped BAM.
BamMerger() - Constructor for class uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.BamMerger
 
BamQualityQuantisation - Class in uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard
 
BamQualityQuantisation() - Constructor for class uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.BamQualityQuantisation
 
BamReadTrimmer - Class in uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard
The class to strip part of a read (fixed position) - typically a prefix of the forward read, and optionally place this and its quality in BAM tags.
BamReadTrimmer() - Constructor for class uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.BamReadTrimmer
 
BamTagStripper - Class in uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard
 
BamTagStripper() - Constructor for class uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.BamTagStripper
